# Vendors Data Wiki

## 1. Overview
This document serves as the **Single Source of Truth** for the Vendors Data Layer. It defines the physical tables available in the system and how they map to the "Logical Data Keys" requested by the Supply Chain Analytics Engine.

## 2. Logical to Physical Mapping

| Logical Key (Report Requirement) | Physical Table ID | Description |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **VENDOR_MASTER**, `Suppliers` | `VND_Vendors` | Master vendor list. |
| **CONTACTS**, `Contacts` | `VND_Contacts` | Vendor contact persons. |
| **RISK_PROFILE**, `Risk` | `VND_Risk_Profile` | Aggregated risk scores. |
| **COMPLIANCE**, `Documents` | `VND_Compliance_Documents` | Certificates and licenses. |
| **AUDITS**, `Audits` | `VND_Audits` | Audit findings. |
| **SCORECARDS**, `Performance` | `VND_Scorecards` | Vendor performance ratings. |
| **CAPACITY**, `Footprint` | `VND_Capacity` | Vendor production capacity. |
| **FINANCIAL_HEALTH**, `Credit` | `VND_Financial_Health` | Credit ratings and stability. |
| **ESG_CERTS**, `Sustainability` | `VND_Sustainability_Certifications` | ESG certifications. |

## 3. Table Definitions

### 3.1 Master Data

#### `VND_Vendors`
*Core vendor master data.*
- **vendor_id** (`string`, PK)
- **vendor_name** (`string`)
- **country** (`string`)
- **segment** (`string`): `Strategic`, `Preferred`, `Transactional`.

### 3.2 Risk & Performance

#### `VND_Risk_Profile`
*Consolidated risk scores.*
- **risk_id** (`string`, PK)
- **vendor_id** (`string`, FK)
- **overall_risk_score** (`number`)
- **financial_risk_score** (`number`)

#### `VND_Scorecards`
*Performance KPIs.*
- **scorecard_id** (`string`, PK)
- **vendor_id** (`string`, FK)
- **period** (`string`)
- **overall_score** (`number`)
- **otif_pct** (`number`)

*Wiki generated by Antigravity Data Engineering.*
